option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: compare_backbones ../ --outdir ../evaluations --model_codename ConvNext-T --model_predictions ../evaluations/baseline-T.csv --model_codename ConvNext-S --model_predictions ../evaluations/baseline-S.csv --model_codename ConvNext-B --model_predictions ../evaluations/baseline-B.csv --model_codename ConvNext-L --model_predictions ../evaluations/baseline-L.csv --model_codename ViT-S/16 --model_predictions ../evaluations/vit-S16.csv --model_codename ViT-B/16 --model_predictions ../evaluations/vit-B16.csv --model_codename ViT-S/32 --model_predictions ../evaluations/vit-S32.csv --model_codename ViT-B/32 --model_predictions ../evaluations/vit-B32.csv --model_codename ViT-L/32 --model_predictions ../evaluations/vit-L32.csv --model_codename Ours-T --model_predictions ../evaluations/opticalnet-T.csv --model_codename Ours-S --model_predictions ../evaluations/opticalnet-S.csv --model_codename Ours-B --model_predictions ../evaluations/opticalnet-B.csv --model_codename Ours-L --model_predictions ../evaluations/opticalnet-L.csv --model_codename Ours-H --model_predictions ../evaluations/opticalnet-H.csv
